markdownContent:
There is an online process for funding applications. Because you will be producing a script for a three- or four-minute podcast, the “Outreach & impact!” (Oi!) office want to see that you can write concisely. In your application, mention briefly:
- the link between your historical research and contemporary societal issues
- if/how your research addresses questions of race (and/or RaCE)
- what are the aims of your fieldwork trip
